title: All's Wright in Love & Lies
description: One secret can destroy two relationships.Teresa loves her life, her husband, and her children. But in the back of her mind, she always wonders 'what if'. One night of passion with her first love decades ago changed her life forever. She never imagines the choice she made all those years ago could affect her daughter’s happily ever after now.Allison’s life is on track. She has an amazing boyfriend and is finally about to achieve everything she’s always dreamed of. Everything is perfect, until her mother’s behavior has her questioning everything she ever believed about her parents’ relationship. What is her mother hiding and why?Will one lie destroy them both?
author: Colleen  Young
